title: How to Get the Gravity Boots in Castlevania Symphony of the Night

steps.headline: Get the Soul of Bat in Castlevania Symphony of the Night.
Head to the Clock room in the Marble Gallery.
Use Soul of Bat and go straight upward.
Go to the right and there is the Gravity Boots.
steps.description: There is a free life potion you can get with this. If you want to know how to activate the Gravity Boots, then read the tips.

text: Get the Soul of Bat in Castlevania Symphony of the Night.  Head to the Clock room in the Marble Gallery.  Use Soul of Bat and go straight upward.  Go to the right and there is the Gravity Boots. There is a free life potion you can get with this. If you want to know how to activate the Gravity Boots, then read the tips.
